dcterms:description: The LIDC-IDRI dataset consists of 1018 thoracic CT images with lesions annotated by four radiologists. Extracted 128x128 px 2D slices yield a total of 15,096 patches, with annotations converted into binary labels indicating the presence or absence of tumors.
dcterms:title: LIDC-IDRI
